security.tlsv1.server.description: Verify the device supports at least TLS 1.0 (as a server)

security.tlsv1_2.server.description: Verify the device supports TLS 1.2 (as a server)

security.tlsv1_3.server.description: Verify the device supports TLS 1.3 (as a server)

security.tlsv1_2.client.desc: Verify the device supports at least TLS 1.2 (as a client)

security.tlsv1_3.client.desc: Verify the device supports at least TLS 1.3 (as a client)
